alert.note: Alert for Creek; Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 30 at 1:48AM CDT until April 30 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CREEK...WESTERN OKMULGEE AND OKFUSKEE COUNTIES... At 148 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Slick to near Paden, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Okmulgee... Bristow... Okemah... Okfuskee... Beggs... Boley... Paden... Bearden... Slick... Castle... Clearview... Preston... Okmulgee State Park... Welty... Mason... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 212 and 229. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
